name: Graveyard Duel
description:
[WAS NOT READY ON GAME JAM DEADLINE]

Description:

PvP local multiplayer game. Collect resources, buy coffins, fill up your graveyard first to win.

Controls:

Player 1 - Keyboard:

WASD - selector move, G - start, N - accept, M - back

Player 2 - Keyboard:

Arrows - selector move, H - start, J - accept, K - back

Also can be played with two gamepads.

Gamepad:

Left stick - selector move, START button - start, [XBOX A/DUALSHOCK CROSS] - accept, [XBOX B/DUALSHOCK CIRCLE] - back

Team:

Aliaksei Tokarau
